The best way to kill a monster
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The best way to kill a monster
By Sivart on Thursday, January 21, 2010 - 07:28 pm:

It sounds awful, but I'm trying to unlock Mock and I was wondering if anyone had a way to kill of a monster fast. I think if I keep stressing it out it'll just run away at some point so I'm not too sure how to go about it.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, January 21, 2010 - 09:08 pm:

You can always feed the life-shortening items like:
Nageel
Kasseitan
Teromeann

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Friday, January 22, 2010 - 04:58 am:

Sueki Suezo always works with its one week lifespan.

By Sivart on Friday, January 22, 2010 - 01:21 pm:

I didn't know Sueki Suezo had such a short lifespan! I was in the process of killing a market Zuum and God, did I feel horrible after the thing died.

I just did non-stop errantry. Thanks for the suggestions because I'm probably going to need to kill another monster at some point.

I feel terrible. :(

By Elf* on Saturday, January 23, 2010 - 09:29 am:

A cheaper method, which only works if you're patient or lucky, is to get a market hare and enter the
New Year's cup (4th Jan). The first monster you fight is the A-level Kitty, who normally flames you
or does something else similar. It's very effective, although you do feel a tad sorry for the
Kittyfood's.

By Rahu on Sunday, January 24, 2010 - 09:52 am:

Sueki Suezo is the best way for a clean conscience too. It dies in a week no matter what you do, so you don't have to feel bad. Also, if you bring it up on a week with a tournement, you might be able to get a little bit of cash out of the deal.

By VashTheStampede on Tuesday, July 6, 2010 - 11:11 am:

I can't find ANY store around here with the original Monster Rancher. =( *sigh*

Which one of the buyable drugs (Larox, Kasseitan, etc) give your Monster the biggest Lifespan hit?

By big jay on Wednesday, July 7, 2010 - 10:44 am:

Paradoxine gives the biggest lifespan hit, its around 18-20 weeks i believe.

By Peter Halat on Wednesday, July 7, 2010 - 05:31 pm:

Nageel only costs 1000G yet it takes away 20 weeks
of lifespan.
